name: Gravity Runner (itch) (luanpotter)
description:
Play for free or pay what you want :)

This is an open source game (GitHub) developed with love using the Flame Engine by the Blue Fire OSS team.

This is a simple homage to Gravity Square, an old infinity runner discontinued by Kongregate, that I used to love.

Classic mode: just the way it was. Simple and addictive. I recommend starting with this one :)

Revamped: we added some powerups and special powers. It gets quite complicated though, be warned!
